name: Aubrey
text: They always make us a good pizza and are super sweet people. Thanks guys! Stay safe!

name: Karen
text: Food has always been great, staff is friendly, timing has only been a problem during Covid19 lockdown. The littlest problem is the staff needs to slice the pizza better, they forgot my sauce cup (but other places do too), they are timid, probably due to their age, and rude people, which includes those who can‚Äôt spell on here.

text: My total was 28 dollars and I gave the delivery guy 40 dollars and asked for just 8 back and he only gave me 5 and I waited 1 hour 20 minutes for my pizza but atleast if was good

text: Not happy with hungry howies!!! The last 2 orders have been messed up , i have gotten something i didn't order the first time around and now they send me a pineapple pizza with no pineapple when i asked for extra pineapple. only to find out they think im lieing about it.

name: sapphire Lynn
text: I ordered a pizza at 7:15 and it didnt show up till 8:38. I called and he said there was a big backup after he told me 35-40 mins. Waiting and waiting..NOT happy. ‚Ä¶More

text: Today I had to wait 20 minutes for my order that was placed at 11:15am and pick up at noon.

name: Chrissy Winberry
text: I called this evening and placed an order! Was told my total $22.57...was told 15-20 min! I sat in the parking lot for 30min! Called in the store and was told I never placed my order!!! WORST SERVICE EVER!!! WILL NEVER USE THIS LOCATION AGAIN!!!

name: vazquez bradford
text: Awesome and delicious food, I like the mood the spot has, and the employees were helpful. I will surely come back again.

text: A few days ago mid day I decided to get a quick lunch for couple co workers and myself. Key word quick, not so much. I ordered online and when I arrived 20 minutes later pizzas were not done. It's not like it was a large order or anything ‚Ä¶More

name: Mike Scanlon
text: Usually really good pizza at a really good price, and the crew are great people. Sadly though, the last couple of times I have gotten Howie bread from this location, it has been pretty undercooked. Hopefully it's not a trend.

name: Brandy Finfer
text: Fast delivery and good pizza. I don't know if my tastes have changed or the recipe for something at Howie's, but I remember it being better for years. It's still good, but used to be my favorite. The addition of stuffed crust makes up for that, though.
